alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 9:03PM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Texas... Rio Grande at Laredo affecting Webb County. For the Rio Grande...including Laredo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande at Laredo. * WHEN...From Sunday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, or 4.0 meters, autos and trucks flood in the lower sections of the mall parking lot. Water is several feet deep in the lower sections of the customs parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 1.4 feet, or 0.4 meter. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday evening, crest near 12.1 feet, or 3.7 meters early Monday afternoon, then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet, or 2.4 meters. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Rio Grande Laredo 8.0 1.4 Fri 8 pm 1.7 7.7 10.6 6.3 3.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
